member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.EmpBasicImpl.CustomizeResourceCal(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},Epicor.Mfg.BO.EmpBasicDataSet)
member.summary: This method will get a current ResourceCal record or create a temporary ResourceCal record to be modified for a Employee. The ProdHours will be defaulted from the weekday of the selected date. If any changes are made to the ttResourceCal record, the UpdateResourceCal method will have to be called to write the temporary ResourceCal record to the database.
member.param: The selected date to be customized

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.EmpBasicImpl.UpdateResourceCal(Epicor.Mfg.BO.EmpBasicDataSet)
member.summary: This method will check to see if the current ttResourceCal record was modified. If it is a special working day or non-working day then it save the ttResourceCal record to the database.
